description: .NET Wrapper for PDF.co Web API - online tools for PDF, barcodes, spreadsheets.
releaseNotes:
.NET Wrapper for PDF.co Web API.

Compatibility: .NET Framework 2.0 or later, .NET Standard 2.0 or later.

PDF.co Web API features:

- Extracts data from PDF files to TXT, CSV, XML, XLS, XLSX, JSON, HTML formats.
- Extracts data from whole document page or specified rectangular region.
- Extracts PDF document information (author, subject, producer etc).
- Searches text inside PDF documents with regex support.
- Splits and merges PDF files, extracts a single page or range of pages.
- Reads text from scanned PDF documents and images using OCR (Optical Character Recognition).
- Makes scanned PDF documents searchable using OCR (Optical Character Recognition).
- Generates barcodes of all popular formats.
- Reads barcodes of all popular formats from PDF documents and images.
- Converts PDF documents to PNG, JPEG, TIFF images.
- Creates PDF documents from images.
- Converts web pages to PDF.
- Converts CSV, DOC, HTML documents to PDF.
- Converts Excel documents to PDF, HTML, CSV, JSON formats.
- And much more...


History of changes:

1.0.0.100 (April 25, 2019) ==========================
- Initial release.
